Added zlib 1.2.11 subtree -
git subtree add --prefix extern/zlib https://github.com/madler/zlib.git v1.2.11 --squash

Added stb -
git subtree add --prefix extern/stb https://github.com/nothings/stb.git master --squash

Added ogg -
git subtree add --prefix extern/ogg https://github.com/xiph/ogg.git v1.3.4 --squash

Added vorbis -
git subtree add --prefix extern/vorbis https://github.com/xiph/vorbis.git v1.3.7 --squash

Added imgui (docking) - 
git subtree add --prefix extern/imgui https://github.com/ocornut/imgui.git docking --squash
